alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Laurens; Montgomery; Telfair; Toombs; Treutlen; Wheeler; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 2:59PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Laurens, Toombs, southeastern Dodge, Telfair, southwestern Treutlen, southeastern Wilcox, Wheeler and Montgomery Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 259 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Ailey to near Ocilla, and moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McRae, Lyons, Alamo, Mount Vernon, Vidalia, Helena, Lumber City, Glenwood, Milan, Uvalda, Ailey, Scotland, Higgston, Santa Claus, Alston, Jacksonville, Tarrytown, Towns, Ohoopee and Horse Creek Wma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Dodge; Laurens; Montgomery; Telfair; Toombs; Treutlen; Wheeler; Wilcox
